thread.section_title: BoxyMo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BoxyMo | www.boxymo.ie
thread.title: JOHN JOE WALSH
thread.title_full: BoxyMo reviewed by JOHN JOE WALSH

author: JOHN JOE WALSH
title: JOHN JOE WALSH
text: When I started with BoxyMo in January, I was very disappointed. I am always disappointed when I can't talk to people directly on the Phone. I then got used to the self-service help on the website and I am now delighted. I changed my car a couple of days ago and the transfer of insurance was a smooth operation. I picked up my new car in Cork, (I live in Galway) I picked a time I wanted my insurance to click in on the new car. I did it all at home on BoxyMo website. Printed out my new Policy straight away, Brought up the car on Friday Morning had Insurance disc on Monday. No Cost. A new appointment to fit a box next week. My driving so far is excellent and I am always aware of having to drive safely. I would hope my Premium will be reduced next year. Very Satisfied now after original doubts.
